name: Photo-and-Map-Show
short_description:
Photo-and-Map-Show is a simple way of setting up a web based photo show out of a collection of jpeg images placed on a www server in a single directory. In one browser window or tab it displays a description of the show and thumbnails of all photos. A click on a thumbnail opens another window or tab where the photo, links to the previous and next ones, and some information about the photo are displayed. The information may include time, place, a map of the place, and a comment (caption), provided the necessary data is available in the photo exif.
Photo-and-Map-Show requires a web server providing php with exif support and some means of file upload, eg. ftp. No other facilities of the server are necessary.
summary: Php scripts to display photos, their times, maps and captions
